LISREL Structural Equations with Observed Variables (yx)

Source: R/lisrel.R
lisrel_obs_yx.Rd

Model-implied variance-covariance matrix for \(\mathbf{y}\) variables (\(\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{\mathbf{yx}} \left( \boldsymbol{\theta} \right)\)) using the LISREL notation for structural equations with observed variables.

lisrel_obs_yx(inv, GA, PH)

Arguments

inv

The inverse of I minus BE (\(\left( \mathbf{I} - \mathbf{B} \right)^{-1}\)).
GA

\(\boldsymbol{\Gamma}_{m \times n}\) coefficient matrix for exogenous variables.
PH

\(\boldsymbol{\Phi}_{n \times n}\) variance-covariance matrix of \(\boldsymbol{\xi}\).

Value

Returns the model-implied variance-covariance matrix for \(\mathbf{yx}\) (\(\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{\mathbf{yx}} \left( \boldsymbol{\theta} \right)\)) derived from the \(\mathbf{B}\) (BE), \(\mathbf{I}\) (I), \(\boldsymbol{\Gamma}\) (GA), and \(\boldsymbol{\Phi}\) (PH), matrices.

Details

$$\boldsymbol{\Sigma}_{\mathbf{yx}} \left( \boldsymbol{\theta} \right) = \left( \mathbf{I} - \mathbf{B} \right)^{-1} \boldsymbol{\Gamma} \boldsymbol{\Phi} $$

References

Bollen, K. A. (1989). Structural equations with latent variables. New York: Wiley.

Jöreskog, K. G., & Sörbom, D. (1996). Lisrel 8: User's reference guide (2nd ed.). Scientific Software.

See also

Other SEM notation functions: eqs_mu(), eqs(), lisrel_fa(), lisrel_obs_xy(), lisrel_obs_yy(), lisrel_obs(), lisrel_xx(), lisrel_xy(), lisrel_yx(), lisrel_yy(), lisrel(), ram_mu(), ram_m(), ram_s(), ram(), sem_fa(), sem_lat(), sem_obs()
